title: Rotate String - String - Easy - LeetCode
content:
We are given two strings, A and B.
A shift on A consists of taking string A and moving the leftmost character to the rightmost position. For example, if A = 'abcde', then it will be 'bcdea' after one shift on A. Return True if and only if A can become B after some number of shifts on A.</p
